name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, specializing in high-performance software solutions. Expert in **Java**, **Git**, and **Maven**, with a solid understanding of **Thread-safe** programming and **REST-API** design. Proficient in utilizing **Docker** for containerization, and experienced in **Linux** environments for seamless application deployment. Demonstrated skill in applying **Clean Code** principles and performing thorough **Debugging** using **JUnit** and **Mockito** to ensure the delivery of robust software. Adept at employing **Redis** for caching and data storage solutions, and leveraging **MongoDB** for database management. Knowledgeable in CI/CD practices using **GitHub Actions** and **GitLab CI** to streamline development workflows.

A proactive Full Stack Developer skilled in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on expertise with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, developing enterprise platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for impactful real-time analytics and automation. Strong background in **microservices architecture** and **event-driven systems** while ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about driving innovation and building secure, maintainable solutions.
